article.title: Air Force Research Laboratory Awards Contract to Dayton Research Institute
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The University of Dayton Research Institute, Dayton, Ohio, was awarded a $35 million contract for the Meteor program, which will include research and development for Air Force electronic and optical applications for the Survivability and Sensor Materials Division.Â Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
